original_title: چریکه بهرام یا ایمان به قدرت تصویر
overview: A documentary about Bahram Beyzai (Persian: بهرام بیضایی; born 26 December 1938). He is an Iranian playwright, theatre director, screenwriter, film editor, and ostād ("master") of Persian letters, arts, and Iranian studies.
title: Ballad of Bahram
